00256     struct MyRayResultCallback : public btCollisionWorld::RayResultCallback
00257     {
00258         virtual btScalar addSingleResult( btCollisionWorld::LocalRayResult& rayResult, bool bNormalInWorldSpace)
00259         {
00260             results.push_back( std::make_pair(rayResult.m_hitFraction, rayResult.m_collisionObject) );
00261             return rayResult.m_hitFraction;
00262         }
00263 
00264         static bool cmp( const std::pair<float, std::string>& i, const std::pair<float, std::string>& j )
00265         {
00266             if( i.first > j.first ) return false;
00267             if( j.first > i.first ) return true;
00268             return false;
00269         }
00270 
00271         std::vector < std::pair<float, btCollisionObject*> > results;
00272     };
